file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-01-02 - MAIN-LANDING-GEAR LEG - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-LANDING-GEAR LEG - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the Main Landing Gear (MLG) leg. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-10-01-900-801-A ♦ MLG LEG - RESTORATION MLG TRAILING ARM ASSY - RESTORA- ALL 32-10-01-900-802-A ♦ TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-01-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG LEG - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the component maintenance manual (CMM) T.P. 145/1170 to restore the MLG leg. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-10-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 32-10-01-400-801-A/400 - T.P. 145/1170 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the MLG leg (AMM TASK 32-10-01-000-801-A/400). J. Restore Main Landing Gear (MLG) Leg (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of EMBRAER T.P. 145/1170 to restore the MLG leg. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the MLG leg (AMM TASK 32-10-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL MLG Leg - Restoration Figure 201 A ZONES 721 731 MAIN LANDING GEAR LEG DET. A 145AMM320064.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-01-900-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MLG TRAILING ARM ASSY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the component maintenance manual (CMM) T.P. 145/1170 to restore the MLG Trailing Arm Assy. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION TRAILING ARM OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - RE- AMM TASK 32-10-08-000-801-A/400 MOVAL TRAILING ARM OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - IN- AMM TASK 32-10-08-400-801-A/400 STALLATION T.P. 145/1170 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Remove the MLG Trailing Arm Assy ( AMM TASK 32-10-08-000-801-A/400). J. Restore Main Landing Gear (MLG) Trailing Arm Assy SUBTASK 900-003-A (1) Refer to the last revision of EMBRAER T.P. 145/1170 to restore the MLG Trailing Arm Assy. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the MLG Trailing Arm Assy ( AMM TASK 32-10-08-400-801-A/400).
